name: Endless Knight
description:
Ever wanted to cut your friend's arms and legs off? Well now you can, get "legless" with a friend in a 2 player duel (local play).

Killed all your friends? That's okay, Endless Knight also features a single player experience with 4 difficulty settings and an absurd story!

Endless Knight is a fighting game inspired by the black knight scene from the Python classic "The Holy Grail". The game sees you cutting opponents' limbs off in a fight to the death!

The mechanics of Endless Knight are different from that of most fighting games. There are no combos or special moves, the focus is more on reaction and blocking than attacking as failure to block will have dire consequences.

Unlike other fighting games, you can continue to fight after your arms or legs have been cut off, but you might find it to be somewhat of a disadvantage.
